```{r}

A <- "HLA-A*02:01"
B <- "HLA-A*68:01"
C <- "HLA-A*24:02"
D <- "HLA-A*69:01"
N <- "HLA-A*02:99N"
b <- "bidirectional"

join <- function(a, b) {
  return(paste0(a, "+", b))
}

```
